description: PAMELA SINHA MATHUR is a software engineer by profession and a creative writer by passion. Born in Kolkata, West Bengal, she now lives in Pune with her husband. Right from her childhood she has been penning poems and stories and this book is a realization of her dream to see her work in print. She is a voracious reader and she also loves movies, good food, travelling, photography and spending time with family and friends.
name: Pamela Sinha Mathur
